content.rendered:
Directed by Dijo Jose Antony

Written by Sharis Mohammed

Star Prithviraj Sukumaran (Aravind Swaminathan). Suraj Venjaramoodu (Sajjan Kumar). Mamta Mohandas (Saba Mariam). Mammootty (Narrator (voice)). Vincy Aloshious (Gouri). Dhanya Ananya (Vidya). Rajesh Babu (Pavan Shetty). Raja Krishnamoorthy (Alok Varma). Sri Divya (Padma). Dhruvan (Shaheen). Pasupathi Raj (Moorthy). Shammi Thilakan (Raghuram Iyer). Ilavarasu (Anbumani). Priyanka Nair (Anitha Nair). G.M. Sundar (N.G. Rao). Vinod Sagar (Victor). Vaishnavi Venugopal (Sana). Harikrishnan (Mathew). Josekutty (Kishore). Midhun Venugopal (Omprakash (as Midhun)). Anand Bal (Police Constable). LittleDarshan (Sreedev (as Childactordarshan)). Benzi Mathews (Media Chief Venkitesh). Shari (Shabana)

Language Malayalam

Production Magic Frames. Prithviraj Productions

Producers Harris Desom. Santhosh Krishnan. Supriya Menon. Justin Stephen. Listin Stephen. Naveen P. Thomas
